context: Paylocity Holding Corporation is a cloud HCM software company focused on payroll, HR, benefits, and workforce management for mid-market. Mid-market HCM leader. Competing with Paycom, Paychex.

competitors.name: Paycom
competitors.notes: Direct competitor in cloud HCM with single-database architecture

competitors.name: ADP
competitors.notes: Market leader in payroll and HCM with solutions for all company sizes

competitors.name: Dayforce (Ceridian)
competitors.notes: Unified HCM platform with strong workforce management

competitors.name: Paychex
competitors.notes: Payroll and HR services for small and mid-sized businesses

competitors.name: UKG
competitors.notes: Comprehensive HCM and workforce management solutions

competitors.name: Paycor
competitors.notes: Cloud HCM platform targeting similar mid-market segment

competitors.name: Workday
competitors.notes: Enterprise HCM competing for larger mid-market customers

competitors.name: isolved
competitors.notes: HCM platform for SMB market with payroll and HR solutions
